title: What was in the OPL showbags yesterday?
body: Please tell me if you were at the cinema or at luna park and what stuff you received in the showbag. Thanks.

replies.body:
As above ^^ With a healthy does of disappointment.

Did anyone else at the Hoyts Carousel screening wait it out? After the first game unwatchable laggy disaster myself and many others bailed.
Hi, what was the main issue at Carousel. We had some weather issues affecting the satellite transmission so let me know some more details please on your experience.
Forsaken jayce, some other stuff... wasnt anything to special (No oce skin)
